vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.15.2; married to Amaziah (H0558);
mother of: Uzziah (H5818)
§ Jecoliah or Jecholiah = "Jehovah is able"
wife of king Amaziah of Judah and mother of king Uzziah (Azariah)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: madre de Uzías, rey de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶可利雅 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華是有大能的"
猶大王亞瑪謝的妻子, 猶大王烏西雅(亞撒利雅)的母親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶可利雅 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华是有大能的"
犹大王亚玛谢的妻子, 犹大王乌西雅(亚撒利雅)的母亲
